comment.body: how to update? i'm a new user.

> [ekaterina](#comment_14_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD): On ZeroHome, the page you get to when you click on the round Zero button that is in the top right corner of any ZeroNet website, there will be a message at the top right telling you there is a new update. Just click that message, then ZeroNet will update itself automatically.
> If you don't see a message there, in the top left, to the right of the "Hello ZeroNet_" text is a menu (3 vertical dots button). There you can check which version you are on right now, the version number is the second last item in the menu, you might already be on 0.6.0.

thank you very much! It has been updated to 0.6.0
